about_the_game:
Rebuke the overwhelming cloud that seizes your consciousness by finding the things that mean the most to you in this world or attempt to escape it by finding one of three doors available to you.

Large black arrows tether you to the doorways, but they are strongest when they’re furthest away. In order to open a door you must visualize it by focusing on the door long enough to paint a mental picture of yourself opening it.

You may also visualize other people, places, or things by looking at them long enough to reclaim some clarity. At times it may help you to rotate so that you can get a new perspective on things that you had previously so routinely overlooked.

Sometimes you might not be able to visualize what you want, no matter how sure you are that you want it. That’s okay, we all have our hang-ups. I sometimes forget how to talk to the people that know me best. It could help to divert your attention elsewhere briefly or simply move on. I trust your judgement.

When you begin to feel your pulse quicken, it may be a sign that you should finish up any business you have. Some people don’t get any indication, but even fewer heed any warnings they are given. It’s up to you to decide what’s important, as long as you know why you’re doing it.
detailed_description:
Rebuke the overwhelming cloud that seizes your consciousness by finding the things that mean the most to you in this world or attempt to escape it by finding one of three doors available to you.

Large black arrows tether you to the doorways, but they are strongest when they’re furthest away. In order to open a door you must visualize it by focusing on the door long enough to paint a mental picture of yourself opening it.

You may also visualize other people, places, or things by looking at them long enough to reclaim some clarity. At times it may help you to rotate so that you can get a new perspective on things that you had previously so routinely overlooked.

Sometimes you might not be able to visualize what you want, no matter how sure you are that you want it. That’s okay, we all have our hang-ups. I sometimes forget how to talk to the people that know me best. It could help to divert your attention elsewhere briefly or simply move on. I trust your judgement.

When you begin to feel your pulse quicken, it may be a sign that you should finish up any business you have. Some people don’t get any indication, but even fewer heed any warnings they are given. It’s up to you to decide what’s important, as long as you know why you’re doing it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2.41GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB Integrated VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.80GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: If you want

short_description: Grandpa is on an adventure to put an end to his pounding migraine, but he only has ten minutes until his painkillers kick in!
